程序包的使用
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.errorhandling

  • 使用org.apache.hadoop.hbase.errorhandling的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.errorhandling  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot  
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.errorhandling使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.errorhandling中的类 
    类和说明
    ForeignException
    A ForeignException is an exception from another thread or process.
    ForeignExceptionListener
    The ForeignExceptionListener is an interface for objects that can receive a ForeignException.
    ForeignExceptionSnare
    This is an interface for a cooperative exception throwing mechanism.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.errorhandling中的类 
    类和说明
    ForeignException
    A ForeignException is an exception from another thread or process.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.errorhandling中的类 
    类和说明
    ForeignExceptionSnare
    This is an interface for a cooperative exception throwing mechanism.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.errorhandling中的类 
    类和说明
    ForeignExceptionDispatcher
    The dispatcher acts as the state holding entity for foreign error handling.
    ForeignExceptionSnare
    This is an interface for a cooperative exception throwing mechanism.
